de.undercouch.citeproc.script

Interface ScriptRunner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonBuilderFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScriptRunner, JREScriptRunner, RhinoScriptRunner

    public interface ScriptRunner
extends JsonBuilderFactory
    Executes JavaScript scripts
    Author:
    Michel Kraemer

      • loadScript

        void loadScript(URL url)
                throws IOException,
                       ScriptRunnerException
        Loads a script from a URL and evaluates it
        Parameters:
        url - the script's URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if the script could not be loaded
        ScriptRunnerException - if the script is invalid

      • eval

        Object eval(String code)
            throws ScriptRunnerException
        Executes the given code
        Parameters:
        code - the code
        Returns:
        the return value from the executed script
        Throws:
        ScriptRunnerException - if the given code could not be executed

      • eval

        Object eval(Reader reader)
            throws ScriptRunnerException,
                   IOException
        Executes a script provided by a given reader
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader
        Returns:
        the return value from the executed script
        Throws:
        ScriptRunnerException - if the script could not be executed
        IOException - if the script could not be read from the reader

        Calls an object's method
        Parameters:
        obj - the object's name
        name - the method's name
        args - the arguments
        Returns:
        the return value
        Throws:

      • callMethod

                String name,
                String[] argument)
                  throws ScriptRunnerException
        Calls an object's method
        Parameters:
        obj - the object's name
        name - the method's name
        argument - a string array that will be passed as the method's first argument
        Returns:
        the return value
        Throws:
        ScriptRunnerException - if the method could not be called
